res0: org.apache.zeppelin.dep.Dependency = org.apache.zeppelin.dep.Dependency@3d205fc2

paragraphs.title: Configure Kafka
paragraphs.text: import org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka.KafkaUtils;import org.apache.spark.streaming.Seconds;import org.apache.spark.streaming.StreamingContext;import kafka.serializer.StringDecoder;import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode;import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD;import org.apache.spark.streaming.Time;import org.apache.spark.sql._;val ssc = new StreamingContext(sc, Seconds(1)); val kafkaParams = Map[String, String]("metadata.broker.list" -> "localhost:9092",                                       "zookeeper.connect" -> "localhost:2181",                                       "group.id" -> "group6",                                       "zookeeper.connection.timeout.ms" -> "10000",                                       "kafka.auto.offset.reset" -> "smallest");val kafkaStream = KafkaUtils.createDirectStream[String, String, StringDecoder, StringDecoder](ssc, kafkaParams, Set("test")).map(_._2);kafkaStream.foreachRDD(rdd => {    println("test");});ssc.start();ssc.awaitTermination();
